entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 12:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
